subject: Vam pro
description_text:
Hello,

Do you sell the vam pro with european power supply?
I am from the Netherlands.

Greetings,
Dirk

conversations.body_text: Hi Dirk Brinksma,  We offer four types of power supplies. By default, we will send the plug type corresponding to your order's country. For EU countries, we provide EU-standard plugs. If you have a specific preference, you can note the desired plug type in your order.Â
